subject: Maintenance and repair of roads and appointement of Site Engineer.
text: HRd 7ry TTTHTf xfearut 7A4 / Phone 91-11-25074 100/25074200 (8v 9ar- 3r ratrrf 144) Y48 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #-5 1 6, #7-10, 4not , 1 farit-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 17.04.2015 Policy Matters: Technical (177/2015) JDecision taken on_FileNoNHAlRatanpur_-Ahmedabad/2o15/CM-Wl Sub:: Maintenance and repair of roads and appointments of Site Engineer. SI.No.IV under Para-2 of   Policy Circular No: Technical  (149/2014) dated 27.01.2014 shall be substituted as under: IV. Approval of bids for maintenance works: Following Delegations of Power was agreed- Lowest bid price is upto 5% above Regional Officer/ CGM(T), HQ the estimated cost. ii Lowest  bid price is more than 5% Member with concurrence of and upto 15% of above the Member (Finance) estimated cost: Lowest bid price is more than 15% Chairman above the estimated cost. Bids may be re-invited in case of single bid. If in re-bidding single bid is received, the same may be approved as per delegation of power as above: 2_ This issues with the approval ofthe Competent Authority: i/oy (V.K Sharnfa) Chief General Manager (Coord.) To All officers and employees of HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices. MMgl NHAL
